document.full_text: rookie defenseman p.k. subban scored a power play game winning goal in overtime to give the montreal canadiens a 2-1 victory over the chicago blackhawks on tuesday, sweeping them into the playoffs.
document.title: canadiens into playoffs, chicago in touch
lines_and_colors: rookie defenseman p.k. subban scored a power play game winning goal in overtime to give the montreal canadiens a 2-1 victory over the chicago blackhawks on tuesday, sweeping them into the playoffs.
